info.name: BitConnect Dashboard (WIP)
info.description: A restyling of the BitConnect user dashboard to modernize it and clean it up a little, according to my likes. This is still a work in progress.
info.additionalInfo:
This current version restyles things, but also removes a couple things that I don't use.

Items removed:
- Referral Link
- Bitcoin Cash Wallet
- Help Guide Link on the right side
